notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: The authors D.Q.P., C.T.T. and P.-F.M.M. conceived and designed the experiments. D.Q.P., A.T.A. and A.T.A. conducted the phytotoxicity and cytotoxicity experiments. M.L.A. contributed with chemical analyses. C.J.A. contributed with plant identification. D.Q.P., P.-F.M.M. and C.J.A. conceived, designed and conducted the statistical analyses. For manuscript editing and revision, all authors equally contributed to this work and approved the final manuscript version for submission.
